snippet: Investigators said it was still unclear what caused the aircraft to hit a house in East Haven, Conn., on Friday morning.
abstract: Four bodies are pulled from wreckage of plane crash in East Haven, Conn; investigators say it is still unclear what caused turboprop aircraft to plunge into house and burst into flames; names of victims are yet to be released.

byline.contributor: Marc Santora and Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Investigators said it was still unclear what caused the aircraft to hit a house in East Haven, Conn., on Friday morning.

headline.main: Four Bodies Are Recovered in Connecticut Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: Four Bodies Are Recovered In Connecticut Plane Crash
